      • getSortedArray

        public java.lang.String[] getSortedArray()
        To retrieve array from outside class pre-sorted using Selection Sort. For the length of the array (minus one) i, initialise index to 0 each iteration so the first element is the start of the comparison. Compares each element in the array to index 0, starting at index 1 j, and using a for loop to iterate until the end of the array. The value of index is only updated if the value of the current element is greater than it; where it is changed to the current value of j. At the end of the for loop, the value of index refers to the element that is largest. That element is then saved to the array at the point signified by i (another for loop counting down from the value of the array length to terminate the iteration when it reaches less-than or equal-to 0).
        Returns:
        namesArray

      • getList

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getList()
